Plot: When a scientist sent back to the prehistoric era strays off the path he causes a chain of events that alters history in disastrous ways.
Title: A Sound of Thunder
Writer: Ray Bradbury (short story), Thomas Dean Donnelly (screen story), Joshua Oppenheimer (screen story), Thomas Dean Donnelly (screenplay), Joshua Oppenheimer (screenplay), Gregory Poirier (screenplay)
Actors: Armin Rohde, Heike Makatsch, Jemima Rooper, David Oyelowo
tomatoConsensus: Choppy logic and uneven performances are overshadowed by not-so-special effects that makes the suspension of disbelief a nearly impossible task.
